column5: Hi. I'm new to this great site. Was wondering if anyone has fished Little Detour thur air cochrane and could share any tips or advise. Thanks
welcome aboard can't help with the lake
Welcome John! Beerman might have been there...........
Hey Jonn, How are you? I have never fished the lake, but my uncles buddies went there last year.. Let me know what u need to know? I,ll talk to my uncles tonight!! Peace
Thanks Beerman. Any info would help[  typs and coluors of bait to bring how they made out all interesting] thanks John DEparting June 14
I sent you a PM.. You will love the lake. They had a blast on it.. Lots of fish and you are going the perfect time!!  Me, I am leaving June 4th!!! I cannot sleep, I am sooooo pumped up!!
